attributes.action: Unban phones in school so that they are allowed at break and lunch.
attributes.additional_details: Well, before September- schools would allow people to use phones to check time and listen to music at breaks and lunches. Now, the teachers will not allow phones on site and even a small sound gets them confiscated. It is inconvenient to go collect it if it is confiscated.
attributes.background: Firstly, sack Gavin Williamson. Then unban phones do that they can be used in the same way as before the new year.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for individual schools.

We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.  Since you started your petition, Gavin Williamson has left the Government.
